entry.title: 3M Scotch 665-6 - Double-Sided Tape 665 (1/4 Inch x 36 Yards x 6.3 mil) 7000125289
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Double Sided Tapes
Price: 5.61

[shortdesc]

Scotch Double-Sided Tape, 665, 6.3 mm x 33 m (1/4 in x 36 yd)

  • Scotch® Double Sided Tape is the perfect no-mess alternative to glue
  • Whether you’re arranging photos in your scrapbook, putting the final touches on a school project or mounting notices or lists, this double-sided tape offers a clean, long-lasting way to ensure that everything stays in place
  • The tape glides off the roll smoothly without need for a liner and cuts cleanly right where you want it to
  • So when you’re looking for a hassle-free alternative to drips, clogs and bubbles, look to Scotch® Double-Sided Tape to take care of those projects that need to come together just right.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Color Transparent
    Length 36yds
    Width 1/4 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Double Sided Tapes
    Thickness 6.3 mil

    Product Information

  • No-mess, hassle-free alternative to glue
  • Both sides of tape coated with a permanent adhesive
  • Glides off roll smoothly and cuts cleanly and easily
  • Invisible when applied
  • Photo-safe for colour photos
  • Does not yellow or dry out over time
  • Tape comes in a box - no dispenser included

entry.title: 3M 616-1X72-RED-BX - Lithographers Tape 616 in Ruby Red (1 Inch x 72 Yards x 2.4 mil) 7000050036
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Lithographers Tape
Price: 23.12

[shortdesc]

3M(TM) Lithographers Tape 616 Ruby Red, 1 in x 72 yd 2.4 mil, 36 per case Boxed

  • 3M™ Lithographers Tape 616 is an optically transparent and photographically opaque tape, primarily designed for many lithographic stripping applications in the graphic arts industry
  • It is available in a wide selection of widths and lengths to meet almost any demand.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Application Negative Stripping at Pre-Press
    Color Red
    Length 72yds
    Width 1 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Lithographers Tape
    Thickness 2.4 mil

    Product Information

  • Ruby Red UPVC film backing to allow accurate positioning
  • Resists effects of changing atmospheric conditions to allow repeated and extended burn times
  • Low caliper backing to minimize ghosting and provide sharper definition
  • Pin-hole free backing to provide continuous opacity to light source to help reduce minimize retouching
  • Firm, long-aging adhesive which is resistant to softening to resist oozing during applications and storage
    		•
